m_szDocTitle: Hybrid car speed record broken | Science! | Geek.com
m_szDocSumamry: Hybrid car speed record broken By  Dec. 29, 2004 10:51 am Subscribing to a newsletter indicates your consent to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy . More Geek Chinese satellite proves reproduction still works in space The Toyota Prius, one of a growing number of hybrid gas/electric automobiles on the market today, has broken previous hybrid speed records, reaching 130.8 miles per hour (210.49 km/h) on a short course. The Prius used in the speed test was a stock model with a few adjustments. The interior of the car was removed to reduce weight, the gear ratio was changed from 4.32:1 to 3.2:1,
